meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>public building</kanji> where you <kanji>welcome</kanji> <kanji>VIP</kanji> guests is a <vocabulary>reception hall</vocabulary>. Or a <vocabulary>guest house</vocabulary> if they're staying the night.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
